column5: Thanks Bruce!!!  Quality time for sure   Thanks Terry!!!  It sure was
bonne fette a jaques!    congrats on the truite rouge!
Thanks Kevin!!!

What a great way to celebrate my 47th today by sharing the shoreline with my daughter   The plan was to get Mélissa into her first trout and she manage to land it     When I woke up.... temperature was 11C with a 13km/h wind from the West and 100% humidity.... perfect  Left home at 6:00am and got to destination around 7:45am.... right away rigged my daughter's rod with a floating jig and worm, mine with a dropshot type rig with 2 hooks and worm.  Here's Mélissa manning the fort while waiting for the byte    Here she is with her very first speckle.... real proud of her    and of course I got into the action too    The next pic I thought I had hooked into the biggest trout    Red horse..... man did it ever put up a great fight  Around noon we called it a day and head back home. We went 3 for 10 and spent quality time together   PRICELESS Hope you enjoy Leechman
Great stuff Jacques, glad you and your daughter got out. Small specks are always great to catch.

Good for you man. That's one of the best parts of fishing for me, spending time with the kids. We don't have a boat but it's great sitting on the shore. It's always funny when my daughter comes. She's 3 and within 10 minutes she's off chasing a butterfly or picking flowers or something!!! Looks like u had great day.
that last fish is a trout!  it's a whistling trout! looks like a fine day!
looks like a fine day to spend with your daughter man. glad she got to experience her first trout.
Great job with your daughter and happy birthday to you Jacques!
Spending your B'day trout fishing with your daughter and getting a few as well, sounds like a perfect B'day Jacques.
Happy Birthday Jacques & all the best to ya !!  Looks like you had a great day out with your daughter!!
Sounds like a birthday well spent. Should try fishing near that cauldron, if there is water flow, there should be some decent brookies hanging around there. Thanks for sharing.
Great job!!
NICE OUTING. GREAT TO SEE THE YOUNG ONES OUT TOO
Good luck keeping the boys away from her.
Happy Birthday Jacques!!! I love father & kid posts!!! I have said it before and I 'll say it again, you are blessed! Thanks for sharing your day with us. Jim
What a great report, Happy Birthday  Joey
\happy birthday... \i love fishing with my daughter too.  \i wish i could pull up beside a river and set up the floats too though
Happy Birthday and congrats on a successful father+daughter outing!

Thanks Tom!!! They sure do   Thanks BigGuppy!!! Shore fishing rocks   Thanks Dr!!! Whistling trout eh.... well that was a biggun then   Thanks alexcba!!!   Thanks Roy!!!   Thanks Chris!!! It sure was   Thanks Lew!!! We sure did

Thanks Johnny!!! On the left hand side of the cauldron is a 30' drop off but the wind today was blowing toward where we were..... bringing lots of bait fish on shore. That is why I decide to setup there. Very good point and will keep it in mind for future outings   Thanks TJ!!!   Thanks COPPER!!!   I have a pretty good idea   Thanks Jim!!! Today was a blessing in itself and I'm glad my daughter join me.... so proud of her   Thanks Joey!!!   Thanks splashhopper!!!   Thanks Victor!!!
awesome outing with your daughter looks like you had a great time
Thanks Corvy!!!  It was a memorable moment that I soon not forget
Happy Birthday Jacques!!! I can't think of a better way to spend a birthday. Man is Melissa ever growing up fast. Soon she will be out fishing you.  All the best.

A very rewarding experience for you Leechman!  A great way to spend time with your daughter and show her the joys of fishing!  I had a similar experience with my nephew on Father's Day - he's 6 and caught his first ever trout - a 8" brown!  Cheers Ryan

Thanks Tony!!!  She sure has and she usually out fishes me most times    and I'm cool with that   Thanks Ryan!!!  Yes it sure was a great time spent along the shoreline and to see her hook into her first.... PRICELESS
Good to see you and the daughter having some quality time. And Happy Birthday. No better way to spend it.
Looks like a great trip Jacques
